#summary Where and what do we click to test it?
#labels Phase-Deploy

= Introduction =

A build is just a fancy name for a new, usually untested, version of the gadget.


= Details =

You can download new builds from the Downloads section, and if you have [http://www.desktop.google.com Google Desktop] installed, all you need to do is launch the .gg file. When they start to add up, become more stable and issues are getting resolved, the [http://desktop.google.com/plugins/i/googlecalculator.html?hl=en official web page] will update the available .gg file to the wide public.
